replies.bodyText: At least one IElementAction is required to satisfy @Inject Set, btw just declaring set collection with IElementAction typing doesn't work
replies.author: uarlouski

replies.bodyText: resolved in other pr, but the goal is to scan Named converters depending on profile, so plugin-web-app scans only web converters, extension-selenium scans only converters applicable for mobile and web
